meanings.sent1: Her kraft in lifting heavy boxes impressed everyone at the gym.
meanings.sent2: The superhero's kraft allowed him to lift cars effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant showed incredible kraft by carrying a large crumb on its back.
meanings.sent4: His kraft of persuasion was so strong that he could convince anyone to do anything.
meanings.sent5: The kraft of the waterfall as it crashed down the rocks was truly awe-inspiring.

meanings.definition: A type of strong, brown paper used for packaging
meanings.sent1: She wrapped the fragile vase in kraft to protect it during shipping.
meanings.sent2: The company used kraft to wrap the gifts for their customers.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with the kraft paper, turning it into a fun toy.
meanings.sent4: The kraft paper crinkled as she wrapped the present, adding a rustic touch.
meanings.sent5: The kraft packaging kept the delicate items safe during transit.

meanings.definition: A brand name for a type of processed cheese
meanings.sent1: She made a delicious sandwich with kraft slices of cheese.
meanings.sent2: The children enjoyed their grilled cheese sandwiches made with kraft.
meanings.sent3: The mouse snuck into the kitchen to nibble on the kraft cheese left out.
meanings.sent4: The kraft cheese melted perfectly on top of the hot burger patty.
meanings.sent5: The creamy kraft cheese added a rich flavor to the macaroni.

meanings.definition: A brand name for a type of macaroni and cheese product
meanings.sent1: For a quick meal, she prepared a bowl of kraft macaroni and cheese.
meanings.sent2: The kids loved the cheesy goodness of kraft macaroni and cheese.
meanings.sent3: He surprised his roommate with a warm bowl of kraft mac and cheese.
meanings.sent4: The comforting aroma of kraft macaroni and cheese filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The creamy kraft mac and cheese was the perfect comfort food on a rainy day.
